privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to Waslaa. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the confidentiality and security of any information you provide while using our website.

content.1: Identifying Information: Name, email address, phone number when you contact us or fill out forms.
content.2: Usage Data: Pages you visit, time spent on the site, device and browser type.
content.3: Voluntary Information: Any additional data you provide when requesting a service or interacting with us.

content.1: To enhance your experience on our website.
content.2: To respond to your inquiries and deliver the requested services.
content.3: To send updates or offers related to our services, if you agree to receive them.

content.1: We do not sell or share your data with third parties for marketing purposes.
content.2: We may share your data with trusted service providers who help us operate the website or deliver services—provided they adhere to our privacy policy.

content.1: We use cookies to analyze user performance and improve user experience.
content.2: You can disable cookies at any time via your browser settings.

content.1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
You have the right to request access to your personal data, correct it, or delete it.
content.2: You can contact us at [your email here] to exercise these rights.

content.1: Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of those sites.
We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

About.description: Waslaa is a creative service that helps companies connect with their customers by designing distinctive brand identities and websites—your partner in building brand success.
About.keywords: Waslaa, branding agency, web design, brand identity, creative service, digital agency, customer connection, Germany
About.title: About Us | Waslaa – Creative Branding & Web Design Agency
About.OGDescription: Learn how Waslaa helps businesses build strong brand identities and websites that engage customers and drive success.

Contact.description: Get in touch with Waslaa — a creative service helping companies connect with customers through distinctive brand identities and websites that drive success.
Contact.keywords: Waslaa, contact, branding agency, web design, brand identity, creative agency, Germany, digital design, website development
Contact.title: Contact Us | Waslaa – Creative Branding & Web Design Agency
Contact.OGDescription: Let’s start your next project together. Contact Waslaa to create a strong brand identity and website that connects you with your audience.

Home.description: Waslaa is a creative agency that helps businesses build strong connections with customers through distinctive brand identity, professional web design, and effective marketing solutions.
Home.keywords: Waslaa, branding agency, web design, marketing, creative agency, digital branding, brand identity, website design, Germany
Home.title: Waslaa – Creative Branding, Web Design & Marketing Agency
Home.OGDescription: We help companies connect with their audience through creative branding, website design, and marketing strategies that inspire growth and success.

Pricing.description: Discover Waslaa’s transparent pricing for creative services — web design, brand identity, and marketing packages that help your business stand out and connect with customers.
Pricing.keywords: Waslaa, pricing, packages, web design, brand identity, marketing, creative agency, digital design, branding agency, Germany
Pricing.title: Pricing | Waslaa – Web Design, Brand Identity & Marketing Packages
Pricing.OGDescription: Explore Waslaa’s flexible pricing plans for web design, brand identity, and marketing — tailored to help your brand grow with style and strategy.

Profile.description: View and manage your Waslaa profile, check your invoices, and review your selected design and marketing packages.
Profile.keywords: Waslaa, user profile, account dashboard, invoices, packages, branding, web design
Profile.title: User Profile | Waslaa – Web Design, Brand Identity & Marketing Package
Profile.OGDescription: Manage your personal data, invoices, and selected Waslaa packages in one secure dashboard.

HelpCenter.description: Find answers, guides, and support for Waslaa’s creative services. Visit our Help Center to get assistance with your account, packages, invoices, and more.
HelpCenter.keywords: Waslaa, help center, support, FAQs, customer support, design services, branding, web design, marketing, Germany
HelpCenter.title: Help Center | Waslaa – Support & FAQs for Design and Branding Services
HelpCenter.OGDescription: Need help with your Waslaa account or services? Explore our Help Center for guides, FAQs, and expert support to keep your creative projects running smoothly.

Privacy.description: Learn how Waslaa protects your personal information. Read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when using our creative branding and web design services.
Privacy.keywords: Waslaa, privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, personal information, data security, user privacy, creative agency, Germany
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Waslaa – Your Data, Our Responsibility
Privacy.OGDescription: Your privacy matters. At Waslaa, we ensure full transparency on how your personal data is collected, stored, and used in line with GDPR standards.
